convertVoltageToTemp

public static float convertVoltageToTemp(float voltage,
                                         int sensorType,
                                         int scale)
convert a voltage to a temperature

Parameters:
voltage - the voltage reading
sensorType - the type of sensor used, one of the constants defined by this class
scale - the temperature scale to use, one of the constants defined the UnitConversionUtils class
Returns:
the temperature as derived from the voltage reading

convertVoltageToRelativeHumidity

public static float convertVoltageToRelativeHumidity(float voltage,
                                                     int sensorType)
convert a voltage to a relative humidity

Parameters:
voltage - the voltage from the sensor
sensorType - the type of sensor used, one of the constants define by this class
Returns:
the relative humidity derived from the voltage reading
